<se_def>*: Hm? <IF_SOLO>A traveller, are you?<ELSE_NOT_SOLO>Travellers, are you?<ENDIF_SOLO>
Well, welcome to Farebury.

<se_def>*: I don't know what you're doing here,
and I don't really care. Just keep yourselves
to yourselves and there won't be any trouble.

Oh, I see. You're looking for someone. Well,
you still might be short of a few things, eh?
<se_low>*: You know, something's been bothering me...
<se_low>*: There was a strange man here the other day.
<se_low>*: He was dressed like a jester, so I thought maybe he was some kind of travelling entertainer. But there was something creepy about him.
<se_low>*: I wonder if he's still in town.

<se_def>*: You'll never guess what!
A horse-drawn wagon just passed by here,

<se_def>*: ......!!! Wait a minute!

<se_def>*: So...y-y-you're w-w-with the monster!?

<se_low>*: This is the second time, you know.
The second time I've lost a friend in a fire.
<se_low>*: If I remember rightly, the first time it happened I was thirty...

<se_low>*: You can never be too careful with fire,
you know.
<se_low>*: It's such a pity. Pity, pity, pity...

<se_low>*: Wot's that? Yer lookin' for someone?

<se_high>*: Welcome to Farebury!

<se_high>*: I knew it! You've got that look about you.

<se_low>Yangus: Eh!? You talkin' about me?

<se_high>*: No, of course not! I understand.

<se_def>*: I'm sorry. I can only do business over the counter. You'll have to go round the other side.

<se_def>*: I see. Well I can help you out then.

<se_def>*: No, 600. If you've got the cash, I've got the goods. Any time you like. I'll be right here.

<se_def>*: You're not? I see...

<se_high>*: Meooow.

<se_def>*: La la la la la ♪

<se_low>*: There was a fire in town just recently.

<se_low>*: Hm? What's that you say? The old man's name? Yes, what was it now...?

<se_low>*: You must leave Farebury at once. I don't wish to be rude, but there will be consequences if you stay here.

<se_low>*: How about this? When you come across monsters that are weaker than you, you can just intimidate 'em to save yourself a fight.

<se_low>*: Most of the time they'll just run away.

<se_low>*: But if you try pullin' the same trick with stronger monsters, you'll soon know about it! You've gotta weigh up each monster carefully.

If I don't get on with the cooking,

<se_high>*: Who are you anyway?

<se_low>*: I can't believe Kalderasha!

<se_high>*: He was a trickster all right! But no jester!
<se_high>*: Zzz... Pity, pitizzz...

<se_def>*: Welcome to The Weary Wanderer!
Farebury's finest inn!
<se_def>*: I'm afraid we're just cleaning the rooms at the moment. Would you mind coming back a little later?

<se_def>*: Ah ha ha! How funny!
That's the back door you came through!
<se_def>*: Or were you hoping to get a closer look at my gleaming golden statue, perhaps? Is that it?

<se_def>*: Well, I can't say I'm surprised.
It's a real attention-grabber, isn't it?
<se_def>*: I actually got given it by a rather smart old gent who stayed here recently.

<se_def>*: Apparently this lucky golden chap brings
safety to the home, happiness to marriage,
prosperity to business and health to life!

<se_def>*: They're all the rage, I hear. In towns and villages all over the place at the moment.
<se_def>*: Well, in that case, I'll have to ask you to go round and come in the other way, please.

<se_def>*: If you find you can't quite see something,
you can always look at things from a different angle. Just use left, right, up and down on the +Control Pad.

<se_def>*: Then, when you want to get back to your normal point of view, just press both the
L button and the R button at the same time.

<se_high>*: He said I'll never see it again!

<se_low>*: Eh? You're lookin' for someone? Get out of here! Why are you borin' me with that rubbish?

<se_low>*: So save it for fightin', all right!?
